alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 4:22AM MST until December 02 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting 30 to 40 mph. Blowing snow possible. * WHERE...I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth, Bitterroot Valley, Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Missoula, and Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Intense snow showers this afternoon and evening could cause sudden reductions in visibility to less than one mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
